charges.charge_description: 18:371.F CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES (ART FRAUD)(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total of TWO (2) YEARS. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of THREE (3) YEARS. The def endant shall pay a restitution in the amount of $2,695,000.00.
